comments: Prof. Young Is very sarcastic. He gets annoyed very easily with students. Definitely a tough grader, no matter how hard you try he wont give you a good grade even if you deserve it. His way of teaching is not bad, but I don\'t recommend him. He takes things personal.

comments: Loved his class! So this course required a service project, of which we got to choose based on the theory we wanted to learn more deeply. That was cool as we didn\'t have to all do the same thing. Prof. Young offered me a chance to learn not only from the textbook and lecture, but from my classmates and from life experience. So down to earth!

comments: Prof. Young can be very corny, but that makes the class a little less boring. He is great as he carries a nice balance between supportive and structured. Lot\'s of reflections, but it made me read and made me a better writer and a citation guru now. Sucked, but worth it! Tests helped me learn what I misunderstood the first time around.

comments: I enjoyed taking the course, however, there was a final paper and a very long final exam. there were dates in which we had to turn in certain portions of our paper. that made it a lot more difficult to focus on the actual paper. very hard grader and i feel that he need to be more mindful that his class isn\'t the only class students are taking.

comments: Professor Young is by far one of the best I\'ve taken. He may seem a little strict at first but he is really understanding. He has no problem stopping from continuing a lesson to explain further details about a subject if needed. His tests are all online and you\'re given several days to complete them. He\'s funny and makes class interesting.

comments: Prof Young is an amazingg professor. He makes the class interesting and he is so caring and charismatic , we as students always have a say which is amazing that he actually hears us out. He makes sure we understand the material in class and he gives us great examples. And it doesn\'t hurt that he\'s also very attractive. He\'s the best at Monroe!!!!!

comments: Young works SO hard toward fostering an inclusive classroom where everyone\'s opinions and experiences matter. Not only does he bring 110% of himself to EVERY class but he ALWAYS helps and works with you so that you can develop on your weakness and gives assignments where you can display your strengths. Because of him I am a better communicator !
